remarks: The unit vector is one at its designated coordinate.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)
statement:
uvcvv.u $e |- U = ( R unitVec I ) $.
uvcvv.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
uvcvv.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
uvcvv.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. I ) $.
uvcvv1.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
uvcvv1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( U ` J ) ` J ) = .1. ) $.
